summary: Makes the world and interior lighting of skyrim ultra real looking. Daylight will be a bit bright. will be fixed in later versions.
descriptionHtml:
This mod anims to make skyrim more real looking. Lighting and weather effects. For example fog weather has fog camera effect. Night time is very dark. Dungeons are dark in non-lit areas. Sunlight is also more real looking. This also adds depth of field to distance areas making LOD more real looking. Gameplay will also change. Torches are now required otherwise something lurking in the dark will get you. 

This mod edits 
-Night time 
-Day 
-Dusk 
-Dawn 
-Inteiors 
-And more npcs will use torches at night. 
-And fog and snow effect 
-And Depth of Field 

Depth of the mod 
-Dungeons are now pitch black in dark areas, torches or some sort of light now have a purpose now. More saturation added to make fire more real looking. Contrast is added to make shadows have more depth. 
-Night time is pure black without lights. Sky is lit tho. 
-Day light is very real looking. Adds contrast, more sunlight, and a depth of field 
-Dusk is more contrasted and saturated, depth of field not added yet 
-Same for dawn. 
-Fog now is wispy when moving and fog weather is gloomy. Contrast added to add more depth. 
-Snow also has camera effect of slow moving snow too or a flurry. 
-effects like mist in a dungeon now have a lighting effect when a light source enters or nears. Much like unreal technology 4 engine 
-sunlight is brighter now to look more real, Snowy areas only have half of normal sumlight amount in this mod. Other wise it looks like your in a light plane. 

This is a ENB and DPV. 
The ENB just means this mod changes a lot. Lighting wise. Gameplay will change. light is required now. Otherwise you die from something lurking in the dark. 

This mod should be compatable with most mods but lighting ones. 

Performence will not drop. 
Plz rate to support and have fun.
author: darealslenderman
